summary: Increases Merchant Stock to five times the normal amount.
descriptionHtml:
--------------
Function
--------------
This mod increases Merchant stock by editing the merchant chests to spawn five times as much stuff. Items owned by merchants or placed in merchant inventory will not be affected.
Spell tomes have not been increased since this only seemed to spawn five of each spell tome.

--------------
Compatibility
--------------
Only the contents of merchant chest containers are edited, so there should not be compatibility issues with mods changing shops, merchants or the location of merchant chests.

--------------
Notes
--------------

This is based upon my increased vendor stock mod for Fallout 3, and I made it for personal use. I am only uploading it to Nexus because I couldn\'t find a mod with similar function. Don\'t expect me to improve on it unless I myself find it necessary. If you want to improve or change it yourself, feel free to do so as long as you give a nod in my direction when uploading it, or change it enough so I can\'t prove I made it first.

I will not -at this time- create a mod increasing merchant gold. There are plenty of those available already.
author: Fippmeister
